responses:
This is a *Covid-19-AssistantBot* 
An attempt to provide basic knowledge,symptoms, preventive measures, live status etc on fingertips.

Here are few suggested frequently used keywords:
*government updates* (For notices by Gov of India)
*live status* (For India)
*top headlines*
*world live status*
*janata curfew*

Reply with *manual* to get more info to use this bot.

Developed by:- Rishabh Kr. Mishra
Mentored by:- Nilanjan Dey
Department of Information Technology
Techno International New Town, Kolkata, India.

We hope this information was helpful.
Help us in sharing the correct information about the novel corona virus and put an end to unauthentic informations.
Share this link with your friends & family,So that they get the correct information.

patterns: when and how to use mask
which kind of masks can be used for corona virus
which kind of masks can be used for coronavirus
responses: See this video by WHO :- https://youtu.be/Ded_AxFfJoQ

patterns: how can i protect myself from covid-19
how can we protect our selves
how to be protected from coronavirus
how to be protected from corona
what measures can we take to avoid coronavirus
What can we do to prevent the corona virus
How to prevent the corona virus
protective measures to prevent corona virus
responses:
Here are some precautions you can take:

1.Washing hands frequently with *soap and water* or using an *alcohol based hand sanitizer*

2.Maintain *at least 1 metre (3 feet)* distance between yourself and anyone who is sick.

3. *Avoid touching* eyes, nose and mouth.

4.Make sure you, and the people around you, *follow good respiratory hygiene*.

5. *Covering your mouth and nose* with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Then dispose of the used tissue immediately.

6. *Avoid going to public areas* if you are sick

7. *Clean surfaces* you touch often

8.If you have difficulty in breathing,fever and cough, seek medical care immediately

9.If possible, *avoid traveling to places*  – especially if you are an older person or have diabetes, heart or lung disease.

For further information you can see this video by WHO :- https://youtu.be/bPITHEiFWLc

patterns: what are the effects of coronavirus
responses: See this video by WHO :- https://youtu.be/qF42gZVm1Bo

patterns: can coronavirus spread by mosquito bites
can it spread by mosquito bites
can coronavirus spread beacause of mosquito bite
can mosquito bite cause corona disease
responses: As of now, there has been no information or evidence to suggest that the new coronavirus could be transmitted by mosquitoes. The new coronavirus is a respiratory virus which spreads primarily through droplets generated when an infected person coughs or sneezes, or through droplets of saliva or discharge from the nose

Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses which may cause illness in animals or humans.  In humans, several coronaviruses are known to cause respiratory infections ranging from the common cold to more severe diseases such as Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) and Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS). The most recently discovered coronavirus causes coronavirus disease COVID-19.

patterns: Are there any specific medicines to prevent or treat the new coronavirus?
is there any antidote for coronavirus
what is the medicine for coronavirus
are there any medicines for coronavirus
responses:
At present, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat the new coronavirus (2019-nCoV).
However, those infected with the virus should receive appropriate care to relieve and treat symptoms, and those with severe illness should receive optimized supportive care. Some specific treatments are under investigation, and will be tested through clinical trials. WHO is helping to accelerate research and development efforts with a range or partners.
COVID-19 is the infectious disease caused by the most recently discovered coronavirus. This new virus and disease were unknown before the outbreak began in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.

patterns: what are the symptoms of covid19
what are the symptoms of covid-19
what are the symptoms of coronavirus
responses:
The most common symptoms of COVID-19 are 
*Fever*
*Tiredness*
*Dry cough*
*Breathing Difficulties* 

Some patients may have aches and pains, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat or diarrhea.
 These symptoms are usually mild and begin gradually. Some people become infected but don’t develop any symptoms and don't feel unwell.
 Most people (about 80%) recover from the disease without needing special treatment. Around 1 out of every 6 people who gets COVID-19 becomes seriously ill and develops difficulty breathing.
 Older people, and those with underlying medical problems like high blood pressure, heart problems or diabetes, are more likely to develop serious illness.
*People with fever, cough and difficulty breathing should seek medical attention.*

People can catch COVID-19 from others who have the virus. The disease can *spread from person to person* through small droplets from the nose or mouth which are spread when a person with COVID-19 coughs or exhales.
 These droplets land on objects and surfaces around the person. Other people then catch COVID-19 by touching these objects or surfaces, then touching their eyes, nose or mouth.
 People can also catch COVID-19 if they breathe in droplets from a person with COVID-19 who coughs out or exhales droplets.

patterns: can the virus be transmitted through the air
can coronavirus be transmitted through air
responses:
Studies to date suggest that the virus that causes COVID-19 is mainly transmitted through contact with respiratory droplets rather than through the air.
You can see the answer on *“How does COVID-19 spread?”* forfurther information

responses:
The most common symptoms of COVID-19 are *fever, tiredness, and dry cough*.
Some patients may have aches and pains, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat or diarrhea. You should seek medical attention.
For any further quesries you can ask for a helpline number by asking *'helpline number'*

patterns: should i be worried about coronavirus
should i worry about getting affected by coronavirus
should i worry about getting infected by coronavirus
responses:
Illness due to COVID-19 infection is generally *mild, especially for children and young adults*. However, it can cause serious illness: *about 1 in every 5 people* who catch it need hospital care.
It is therefore quite normal for people to worry about the COVID-19 outbreak.
 Instead of worrying about the corona virus we should *take preventive measures*.
 For further information about the preventive measures you can ask 'preventive measures for corona virus'

*NO*.
SARS was more deadly but much less infectious than COVID-19. There have been no outbreaks of SARS anywhere in the world since 2003.

patterns: is it safe to receive a package from any area where COVID-19 has been reported?
can i recieve any package from a coronavirus infected area
can i recieve a package from a coronavirus infected place
can i recieve a package from a COVID-19 infected place
how about recieving package from infected areas
responses: Yes,it is safe to recieve a package that comes from an affected area as the likelihood of an infected person contaminating commercial goods is low and the risk of catching the virus that causes COVID-19 from a package that has been moved, travelled, and exposed to different conditions and temperature is also low.

Death Rate = (number of deaths / number of cases) = probability of dying if infected by the virus (%). This probability differs depending on the age group.
